Located in Al Mouthanna Street in Hawally City, Terrace Furnished Apartments- Hawally 2 is just a 15-minute drive from Kuwait City. It boasts free Wi-Fi in the entire hotel, a 24-hour front desk and a garden.

The modern, air-conditioned apartments are elegantly decorated. Each accommodation features a living room with a flat-screen, while the kitchen includes an oven, a fridge and kitchenware. The bathroom has a shower and free toiletries.

Description:
Located in Ibn Khaldoun Street in Hawalli district, Continental Hawalli Hotel is a 15-minute drive from Marina Beach. It offers free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel, a fitness centre and a 24-hour front desk.

The rooms at Continental Hawalli have a TV, a fridge and an iron. Some rooms have a small kitchenette with stove top and a washing machine. Room service is available 24 hours.

The surrounding area has nearby restaurants which are 8-minute drive from the hotel. Guests can enjoy tea and coffee in the lobby.

Continental Hawalli is a 2-minute walk from Mastora Centre. Muhallab Mall is a 10-minute walk away. Kuwait International Airport is 20 minutes by car. Free public parking is available on site. Some nationalities can get an entry permit stamped in their passport upon arrival at the airport. Please check your visa requirements before traveling.

Please note that Continental Hawally Hotel doesnt accept bookings from non-married couples. All couples must present a valid marriage certificate upon check-in.

Please note that guests cannot bring a visitor to their room.

Description:
Heidelberg Apartment features city views, free WiFi and free private parking, located in Kuwait, 7 km from Al Fanar Complex.

Featuring a kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. There is a private bathroom with shower in every unit, along with slippers, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Al-Bustan Mall is 7 km from the aparthotel, while Marina Crescent is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Kuwait International Airport, 11 km from Heidelberg Apartment. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Le Jazz Hotel is just 3 km from Al Shab Theme Park. It features free Wi-Fi, a fitness centre and spacious rooms with seating areas.

The restaurant, Artizana, offers panoramic Kuwait views and a buffet breakfast every day. For lunch and dinner, an à la carte menu of international specialities is offered.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide information about the Le Jazzs car rental service. The hotel also offers a business centre.

Description:
Overlooking the Kuwait Bay, this lively resort in Salmiya features a private beach. It offers air-conditioned studios and suites.

Built around the pool, accommodation at Argan Al Bidaa Hotel and Resort , Kuwait includes private balconies and satellite TV. Guests can choose between the open-plan studios or the larger suites with separate living rooms.

Local food can be tasted at Argan Al Bidaa Hotel and Resort , Kuwaits restaurant, which can also arrange a pool-side breakfast or a beach-side barbeque. There are many coffee shops and restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

Argan Al Bidaa Hotel and Resort , Kuwait is 1.3 km from Souk Salmiya and 3.2 km from Kuwait Scientific Centre and Aquarium. Kuwait city centre is approximately 15 km away. A damage deposit of KWD 50 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
Some nationalities can get an entry permit stamped in their passport upon arrival at the airport.

Please note that the hotel offers transfer from/to the airport (surcharges apply). Guests are kindly requested to inform the property in advance if they wish to make use of this service. Contact details can be found on the booking confirmation.

Please note that all Kuwait nationals couples must present a valid marriage certificate upon check-in.

Please note that smoking is not allowed in the rooms, lobby and restaurant.

Note that a surcharge is added for requests to upgrade for ground floor rooms as they have a
terrace.

Please note that all couples must present a valid marriage certificate upon check-in.

The Beach area access will be temporarily closed starting from October 09, 2021, until further notice, due to some works required to complete the hotel facilities.

Address: Sultanate of Oman WadiyaynPO Box 922512 Buraimi
Description:
Mahadha Hotel is built like a Castle, using local stone and Italian Marble. Its ceilings are decorated like a Bedouin tent. The air is fresh and clean as we sit in the mountains of Oman and where there is a fresh breeze all the year around. Indeed the weather is unique.Even thye water in our swimmi9ng pool is from our own springs. The hotel sits in its own grounds of 4 square kilometres and is private and secluded other than the sound of the birds singing. Mahadha Hotel is a mountain resort featuring a traditional décor. It is situated in a secluded location in Mahadha near Buraimi. It offers an outdoor pool, a bar, gym and a restaurant that offers a 24-hour room service.

All rooms and suites are warmly decorated and fitted with tiled floors. Each one offers a small seating area with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The suite includes a spacious living room with a dining area.  The bathroom is fitted with a bath and a shower.

Mahadha Hotel is a 5-minute drive from the Oman- UAE Border and 10 minutes by car from Emirate of Al Ain. The hotel offers free WiFi in public areas and complimentary on-site parking. Please check your visa requirements before you travel.

Description:
Almassa offers air-conditioned rooms. It has an elevator, and free wired internet is available in public areas.  Free private parking is available on site.

Almassas simply furnished rooms come with a satellite TV and a minibar. An iron and a safety deposit box are included.  All have a private bathroom.

A variety of drinks and sandwiches are available at Almassa Hotels snack bar. The 24-hour staff can also provide room service.

The nearest mall is an 8-minute drive from Almassa Hotel. Lulus Hypermarket is about 2 km away. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
The Jibreen is a traditional hotel with free Wi-Fi and free parking. It is located in historical Bahala, 2 Km from Jibreen Castle.

Rooms are decorated combining modern amenities such a TV set, and traditional features. They all enjoy views of the surrounding mountains.

The restaurant of Jibreen Hotel offers a varied menu, with dishes from Arabic, Indian, Chinese, and Continental cuisine. Room service is available.

Jibreen Castle is 3 kilometres away and the historical Bahala Fort only slightly further. Muscat International Airport is 90 minutes drive from the hotel. Please check your visa requirements before you travel.

Description:
Bahla Hotel Apartments is located in a picturesque valley surrounded with tall range mountains known as Bahla. It offers modern accommodations with free Wi-Fi. Ironing and laundry services can be arranged.

All rooms and apartment s are fitted with tiled and carpeted floors. Each provides you with a flat-screen TV, a small table and an electric kettle. The apartment includes a living room.  A bath and a shower is fitted in the bathroom.

The hotel is 2 km from Bahla Fort, 18 km from Al Hoota Cave and 38 km from Nizwa. Free private parking is possible on site. Please Check your visa requirements before you travel.

Description:
This hotel is situated in Doha, close to the National Museum of Qatar.

Built in 2000, this air-conditioned hotel has a total of 26 rooms on offer. Amongst the hotel's facilities count a reception with a safe and a currency exchange counter. Furthermore, the hotel includes a café, a nightclub and a restaurant. Room and laundry services are also available. A car park may also be used by guests arriving by car.

The rooms have an en suite bathroom and satellite/cable TV. The air conditioning is centrally regulated.

If arriving from the airport take a right and at the first set of traffic lights take another right. Pass over two crossings and take a left at the third crossing. This hotel is located just on the right-hand side.

Address: Al Mansoura Najma 550 Doha P.O. Box 37303Al Mansoura NajimaDoha
Description:
Chairmen Hotel is situated conveniently between Dohas Airport (8 km) and Dohas Business District (9 km). It is also just 3 km away from old-Dohas famous Souq Waqif (traditional Arabian market). With free WiFi offered throughout the property and free dedicated parking, youll remain connected during your stay.

The property is equipped with finely appointed rooms that feature ultra-comfy beds befitting of a 5-star hotel. All rooms include a flat-panel TV with connectivity to local and international programming. Some rooms also feature a lounge-seating area. All rooms come equipped with complimentary tea, coffee, and a kettle, as well as a private lavatory with complimentary toiletries and hair dryer.

Chairmen Hotel features a highly-rated restaurant featuring a variety of cuisines including Arabic, Filipino, Indian, and International fare. A well-equipped gym is also provided for all guests.

Chairmen Hotel offers fine meeting facilities. Its Pearl Meeting Room offers full-service facilities for meetings of up to 25 guests and offers audio-visual support. This room can also be outfitted for banquets of up to 40 guests.

The Chairmen Hotel proudly offers airport-hotel transfer bookings (for a fee), rental cars, and is happy to book a wide variety of excursions around Doha and its natural deserts. Please check your visa requirements before you travel. A shuttle to and from Doha International Airport can be arranged for a fee. This service is available between 07:00 hours and 22:00 hours. Please contact the hotel directly if you wish to make use of this service. Contact details can be found on the booking confirmation.

The hotel has a business centre and offers meeting facilities. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel. There is also a 24-hour front desk that can assist in laundry and ironing services.

Abha International Airport is 19 km from Assalam Palace, and free airport shuttle is provided. Free private parking is available on the hotels site. Please check your visa requirements.

Address: Abha City Po Box 1100 Abha Abha
Description:
Abha Palace hotel located on the edge of Al-Sad Lake, 10 minutes from Abha Airport . The hotel rooms have the overlook to the Al-Sad Lake and surrounding mountains.

The well-appointed rooms at Abha Palace include a spacious seating area with a flat-screen cable TV. All rooms come with a minibar and a private bathroom stocked with toiletries. The suites provide floor-to-ceiling windows, plush sofas, carpeted floors and exquisite wooden furniture are part of the elegant décor.

Massages are available at the spa. It includes a well-equipped gym and an indoor swimming pool. Guests can also relax in the sauna or hot tub.

Near  there is  a recreational park which the guests will be enjoy games, cable car ride starting from the station next to the hotel until the Green Mountain, where they can enjoy the amazing  views overlooking of Abha City.

Sightseeing tours through the Aseer Region can be arranged. In addition, private trips to Al Sahab Park and traditional markets are offered. Abha Palace is directly linked to Jebel Zerrah and Abu Khayal by 2 cable cars. Abha Airport is a 30-minute drive away, and a shuttle can be arranged. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Spa and gym facilities at this property are unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
A damage deposit of SAR 300 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note that 24 hour room service is available, and food and beverages are only allowed inside rooms.

Please note that during the month of Ramadan, Suhoor will be served instead of breakfast.

Description:
Premier Inn Abu Dhabi International Airport is directly accessible after Arrivals Passport Control via the air-conditioned Skypark walkway in Terminals 1 & 3. The hotel features free Wi-Fi in all areas, stunning views from the roof-top swimming pool, a fully equipped gym, bar and 24hr a-la carte restaurant, Room Service and Costa Coffee outlets.

All bedrooms have a flat screen TV, individually adjustable air conditioning, a mini cooler, tea & coffee making facilities, work area and en-suite bathrooms with a bathtub and overhead shower. Early check-in is available subject to a supplement and availability on arrival.

The hotel is located just a 25 minute drive from central Abu Dhabi and on-site parking is free of charge to all guests. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
All guests are required to provide identification upon check-in. Guests who do not reside in the UAE must provide their passport. Guests who are residing in the UAE or GCC can provide their Emirates ID / GCC ID card or passport.

If arriving by air - The hotel is located landside and beyond Airport Passport Control. Therefore a visa to enter Abu Dhabi may be required.

Description:
This hotel is located on the A93, the road running between Banchory and Braemar. Dyce Airport and the train station are 16 km away. The hotel is conveniently situated for the local bus services into the centre of Aberdeen (9.5 km away). Guests may enjoy many attractions here as well as the nightlife with many excellent clubs, bars and restaurants. Countless shopping venues, the tourist area as well as links to the public transport network can be found just 6 km away.

The hotel was originally a 17th century working corn-mill and still today the waterwheel is a highlight of the comfortable restaurant, which offers guests a relaxed atmosphere and excellent traditional menu. Guests who prefer peace and quiet there is a bar in the winter garden. For banquets or conferences there are 2 function rooms available with a capacity of 20 - 80 people. The historic hotel also offers its guests an entrance hall with reception and parking for those arriving by car. Guests can also make use of the laundry and room services.

The rooms offer guests a warm and comfortable atmosphere through their use of soft tones and oak furnishings. From most of the rooms guests have a magnificent view over the surrounding natural landscape and farmland. Tea and coffee-making facilities, an en suite bath/ shower with hairdryer and a TV and trouser press also come as standard.

There are several golf courses, including Royal Deeside, Hazlehead, Peterculter, Aboyne and Inchmarlo, close to the hotel.

Breakfast is served every morning. Lunch and dinner may be taken as a set menu.
HotelFacilities: Breakfast Set menu lunch Set menu dinner Hotel American Express MasterCard Visa Bathroom Shower Bathtub Hairdryer TV Carpeted floors Room service Laundry service Bar Restaurant Conference room

All of the rooms at Hôtel Le Mont Jorat have a balcony with mountain views. Each room also includes a private bathroom with a bath or a shower and free Wi-Fi access.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the communal lounge. The hotels restaurant offers traditional, Savoyard dishes and guests can dine on its furnished terrace.

Set in Brest and with National Maritime Museum, Brest reachable within less than 1 km, Mercure Brest Centre Port offers a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. National Botanical Conservatory of Brest is 4.7 km from the hotel and Oceanopolis is 5.8 km away.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Mercure Brest Centre Port the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Popular points of interest near Mercure Brest Centre Port include Brest Castle, Brest Railway Station and Brest Arsenal. The nearest airport is Brest Bretagne Airport, 13 km from the hotel. Description:
Located in a peaceful green area of Abano Terme, this family-run hotel is a few steps from the towns thermal spa. All rooms are air conditioned and most feature a balcony. Wi-Fi is free in all public areas.

The Lanterna Hotel features a sweet Italian breakfast, served daily in the lounge bar, or on the outdoor terrace in the summer. A full continental breakfast is available on request.

Parking is free on site and the nearest bus stop is just 50 metres away. Terme Euganee Train Station is 3 km away for the Padua-Bologna train line. Padua centre is 20 minutes away by car or bus, while Venice is accessible by car or train, in less than 1 hour.

Guests can enjoy discounted rates at a nearby thermal swimming pool and spa. Please note check-in and check-out are not possible outside of normal opening hours.

If you expect to arrive outside reception opening hours, please inform the property in advance.

Description:
Family-run Hotel Terme Belvedere is located in Abano Terme, just 50 metres from the local bus stop connecting with Padua. It features a private parking, and free Wi-Fi. Rooms are en suite and come with a TV.

The Belvedere serves a continental buffet breakfast on the covered patio or in the hotel dining room. The restaurant serves both Veneto and classic Italian dishes.

The wellness centre is complete with sauna, an indoor pool and massage treatments.

Padua is a 25-minute drive from Hotel Terme Belvedere, while Vicenza is 45 km away. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Hotel Terme Belvedere in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.
Please note that spa access comes at an extra charge when booking Basic rooms.
Extra services not included in the reservation, like for example the access to the SPA area (swimming pool + sauna), can be bought only at the hotel (upon availability) with an extra amount that varies depending on the number of spots still available and on the period booked.

It is forbidden to leave children and pets alone in the room and in the common areas of the hotel. In the common areas, pets have to be on a leash or in a pets carrier, and cannot access into the dining room, the garden and the SPA area.

Description:
Boasting a 100m² terrace, Albergo Meublè Vecchio Scarpone is in Baceno, 18 km from Devero ski slopes and a 20-minute drive from Domodossola.

The rooms have air conditioning, a TV, and a private bathroom with hairdryer. They have large windows and rustic furnishings.

A sweet buffet breakfast is available daily and includes homemade pastries, cakes and jams.

A bus to/from Domodossola Train Station stops a few minutes walk from the property, while the Devero Park and the Swiss border are a 25-minute drive away. In the park you can hike and reach the Del Toce waterfall.

Description:
Boasting an outdoor pool with naturally heated thermal water, as well as an indoor pool, Hotel Abano Astoria offers accommodation 5 minutes walk from Abano Terme city centre. Guests can enjoy free WiFi throughout.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Albano Astoria feature a balcony overlooking the garden. A minibar, flat-screen TV and private bathroom are featured.

A breakfast buffet is provided daily, while the on-site restaurant serves typical dishes from the Veneto region as well as other specialties.

Guests can also enjoy the Astoria Spa which offers a sauna, hot tub, hot spring bath and a fitness centre. Treatments are available upon request.

Hotel Abano Astoria is 5 minutes drive from Terme Euganee Thermal Baths. Policlinico Abano Terme Hospital is 50 metres from the property, while Padua is a 20-minute drive away. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Hotel Abano Astoria in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Stay in the only luxury 5-star hotel in the Padua area. Richly decorated rooms, free Wi-Fi and full spa programmes are all yours when you book the Abano Grand Hotel.

Experience total relaxation and well-being at Abano Grand Hotel, which is set in a traffic-free area of the city. Take a stroll in the large green gardens. Receive discounted rates at 3 nearby golf clubs.

Abano Grand Hotel offers an extensive wellness centre and spa. You will have saunas, thermal baths, a wide variety of massages, 3 thermal pools, beauty and thermal treatments and a hot tub.

Stay in spacious classically designed suites or rooms. You will have a small living area and a master bedroom with 1 queen-size bed or 2 twin beds. Free Wi-Fi access is available in room and throughout the hotel.

You will have 4 meeting rooms at Abano Grand. There is a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage and free parking on site. The hotel offers weekly gala events with live music.

Savour a gourmet meal at the hotel restaurant. You can choose fine wines from the restaurants excellent list. When booking more than 6 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Montirone Park

Location : Located in Abano Terme, Hotel Terme Bristol Buja is within a 15-minute drive of Montecchia Golf Club and Catajo Castle. This 5-star hotel is 6.9 mi (11.2 km) from Gran Teatro Geox and 7.3 mi (11.7 km) from Barbarigo Garden.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 139 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Dining : Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel s room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. A complimentary self-serve breakfast is served daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM.

Renovations : The property is closed between June 30 and July 31.

Description:
This modern hotel in Aachen is conveniently located less than a 1-minute drive from the A4 motorway. It offers stylish accommodation with free WiFi access.

ibis budget Aachen Nord features bright rooms decorated with modern interiors. Each air-conditioned room is complete with a flat-screen TV, work desk and a private bathroom.

A hearty buffet breakfast is served every morning in ibis budget Aachen Nords trendy dining room.

Aachens Old Town is a 12-minute drive from ibis budget Aachen Nord, where visitors can explore sights such as Aachen Cathedral and the Elisa Fountain.

Free parking is provided by ibis budget Aachen Nord. The Eurogress Aachen is 2.6 km away. In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property can only accept bookings from essential workers/permitted travellers, during dates where such guidelines exist. Reasonable evidence must be provided on arrival. If it isnt provided, your booking will be cancelled on arrival.

It is not possible to stay at this property for Coronavirus (COVID-19) quarantine purposes.
Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.
Please note the reception is open from 7:30-10:00 a.m. and from 5:00-9:30 p.m.

Guests expecting to arrive after 22:00 are kindly asked to call the property on the day of arrival to get further instructions for the check-in machine. In the event of problems an emergency call button is available in the entrance area.

Any outstanding balance should be paid on arrival. Non-refundable rates can only be booked by the person who will stay at the hotel. For security purposes, this credit card must be shown at check-in. Please contact the hotel in advance if your arrival will be outside of the opening hours to receive a check in code. Without credit card details reservations are held until 14:00, at which point it is possible that the rooms are reassigned. The booking number needs to be entered at the check-in point to receive the access code for the main door.

Description:
Featuring 1-star accommodation, ibis budget Dueren West is set in Düren - Eifel, 29 km from Aachener Soers Equitation Stadium and 30 km from Eurogress Aachen. The property is situated 31 km from Aachen Central Station, 31 km from Aachen Cathedral and 32 km from Historical Town Hall Aachen. The property is allergy-free and is located 31 km from Theatre Aachen.

Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also feature free WiFi. At ibis budget Dueren West the rooms come with a desk and a flat-screen TV.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

RheinEnergie Stadion is 37 km from ibis budget Dueren West, while Vaalsbroek Castle is 39 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cologne Bonn Airport, 56 km from the hotel. Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).

Description:
This charming, 400-year-old timber framed hotel offers central, comfortable accommodation in the historical town of Stolberg in the southern Harz Mountains, Saxony-Anhalt.

The Hotel Zum Kanzler lies on the picturesque market place, opposite the town hall. Guests can choose between rooms with views over the market place or of the nearby forest.

A wide and varied buffet breakfast is provided, free of charge, in the mornings in the traditional-style restaurant.

You can enjoy delicious regional cuisine here in the evenings, with ingredients supplied by the in-house butchers.

Round off the evening, in fine weather, with a drink outside on the market place terrace. Pets are allowed upon request for a surcharge of EUR 5 per pet per night.

Description:
This farm stay accommodation is located in the village of Achslach, surrounded by beautiful Bavarian Forest countryside. Paulas Bauernhof offers apartments with a balcony or terrace.

All apartments at Paula Bauernhof come with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave.

Guests are welcome to visit the stables and get to know the farm animals. Younger guests will also enjoy the childrens playground.

The Hirschenstein Mountain is 100 metres away, and the surrounding countryside is ideal for cycling and horse riding. Rental bikes are available, and the Kalteck and Geißkopf ski lifts are 4 km away.

On-site parking is free, and Gotteszell? Train Station is 7 km away. Nearby leisure attractions include the Erlebnishof Alte Mühle visitors mill (8 km) and the Kart-O-Mania carting track (9 km). Please inform Paulas Bauernhof in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
HotelFacilities: Free self parking Pets allowed Garden Terrace Skiing Family rooms Internet access Massage Children s playground Table tennis Hiking BBQ facilities Cycling Heating Horse riding Free WiFi Ski school Terrace Vending machine - Snacks & Drink Parking onsite WiFi (surcharge)

Description:
This 5-star superior hotel occupies a restored 16th century palace in the Weserbergland Schaumburg-Hameln Nature Park. It is surrounded by its own park which includes a lake and an 18-hole golf course. Free WiFi is provided in nearly all areas.

In the individually decorated rooms, amenities include antique furniture, satellite TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer and shower products.

This hotel offers an extended spa and wellness area including sauna, steam bath, ice fountain, indoor pool and an experience shower. Relaxation rooms and a terrace are also available.

National specialities are served in the Schlosskeller. The historic Renaissance-Räumen offers French cuisine. A large breakfast buffet is prepared each morning at the Schlosshotel Münchhausen.

The wooded surrounding region is ideal for hiking and cycling. Day-trip recommendations include the town of Hameln, famous for its story of the Pied Piper, which lies only 10 kilometres away. Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Due to the popularity of the restaurants, advance reservations are recommended.

1 child up to 5 years of age will not be charged for breakfast.

Hotel Crunia I A Coruña is the closest hotel to A Coruña Airport and lies only 3 km from the city centre. Free Wi-Fi is available in all areas.

All of the rooms at the Crunia Hotel have air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV and a full bathroom with hairdryer. 4 of the rooms are adapted for people with reduced mobility. Most offer views over the Ría.

Crunia has a café-restaurant with bar service, and a terrace.

Hotel Crunia I A Coruña features both a garage and outdoor car park. The local area includes sports facilities, university buildings and access to motorways such as the AP-9.

There is a bus stop next to the Hotel that takes you directly to A Coruña city centre. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

It is not possible to stay at this property for Coronavirus (COVID-19) quarantine purposes.

Description:
Property Location
When you stay at Antiochos Hotel in Adiyaman, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Adiyaman Museum and Pirin Caves. This 4-star hotel is 2.1 mi (3.4 km) from Adiyaman Fortress and 25.6 mi (41.2 km) from Severan Bridge.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 63 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a hair salon.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 6 AM to 10 AM.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.

Description:
Amphawa Nanon Hotel offers modern air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony and free Wi-Fi. Guests can rent a bicycle to go explore the area or book a canal tour at the tour desk. For deep relaxation, guests can arrange massage treatments at the front desk.

The hotel is 50 metres from Amphawa Evening Floating Market. It is a 10-minute drive to Maekon Railway Market and a 15-minute drive to Don Hoi Lot. Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 2-hr drive away.

Colourful rooms at Amphawa Nanon Hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom.

For convenience, the hotel is equipped with luggage storage and meeting facilities. Free public parking is possible on site.

Thai and European cuisines are offered at the restaurant, located in the lobby of the property. Guests can enjoy seafood dishes at The Deck Terrace.

Description: HotelDescription#This luxurious resort is situated amidst beautifully landscaped gardens and a tropical forest. The resort is located within the peacefully secluded Huay Yai area of southern Pattaya. The resort is situated just a 10-minute walk from Jomtien Beach and is just 15 minutes from the centre of the city. Suvarnabhumi International Airport is located just 80 minutes' driving distance away. The resort comprises contemporary Thai-style villas set amidst luxuriant greenery. The resort enjoys natural surroundings of manicured lawns, coconut palms, exotic Asian flora, ornamental bridges and manmade waterfalls, all set overlooking a crescent shaped lagoon. The resort offers guests a host of first-class facilities, including invigorating massages, a karaoke room and Thai cooking classes, for the ultimate tropical-living experience.

Description:
Situated in Alor Setar, 48 km from Asian Cultural Village, Galleria Homestay Islamic Alor Setar provides accommodation with a garden, free WiFi, a shared kitchen, and a shared lounge. This holiday home offers free private parking and a 24-hour front desk.

The air-conditioned holiday home consists of 4 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a kettle, and 3 bathrooms with a shower and free toiletries. The holiday home also features a seating area, washing machine and 3 bathrooms with a hairdryer.

A sun terrace is available for guests to use at the holiday home.

Dinosaur Park Dannok is 48 km from Galleria Homestay Islamic Alor Setar. The nearest airport is Sultan Abdul Halim Airport, 6 km from the accommodation. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Couples checking in together must show valid identifications and a proof of marriage. The property has the rights to refuse bookings made by a group of non-family members.

HotelName: Abashiri Ryuhyou no Oka Youth Hostel
Description:
Abashiri Ryuhyou no Oka Youth Hostel offers affordable dormitory-style accommodations with bunk beds. Guests can rent bicycles to tour the area and use the free Wi-Fi available at the entire property. JR Abashiri Train Station is a 5-minute drive away.

The rooms come with heating facilities and carpeted floors. Each accommodates up to 5 guests. Bathrooms and toilets are shared.

Free parking is available on-site and luggage storage is provided at the front desk. Japanese dishes featuring local ingredients are served for dinner and a Western set menu is available for breakfast. All meals are served at the dining room.

Yough Hostel Abashiri Ryuhyou no Oka is a 10-minute drive from Abashiri Prison Museum and a 15-minute drive from Cape Notoro. Memambetsu Airport is a 45-minute drive away. Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.

Guests without a meal plan who want to eat breakfast or dinner at the property must make a reservation at least 1 day in advance.

At time of booking, you must inform the property of what time you plan to check in. If your check-in time changes, please update the property. Please notify the hotel directly if you are arriving after 22:00.

To use the propertys shuttle, please make a reservation in advance.

Description: Hotel New Rasung is conveniently located in the popular Sangnok gu area. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as sauna, golf course (within 3 km), massage, billiards, karaoke. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Ansan-si has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Hotel New Rasung.

Description:

Location : A stay at Lotte Hotel Busan places you in the heart of Busan, within a 10-minute drive of Nampodong Street and Gukje Market. This 5-star hotel is 4.5 mi (7.2 km) from Gwangalli Beach and 5.4 mi (8.7 km) from Busan Exhibition and Convention Center.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 650 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and minibars. Your bed comes with down comforters and premium bedding. Description:
Pondok Alam Bukit is situated in Tirtagangga and features a garden. There is a terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking.

At the guest house, rooms are fitted with a desk, bed linen and a balcony with a mountain view. The rooms have a wardrobe.

Guests at Pondok Alam Bukit can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Bike hire and car hire are available at this guest house and the area is popular for cycling.

Speaking English and Indonesian at the reception, staff are always on hand to help.

The nearest airport is Ngurah Rai International, 80 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Description:
Set amidst tropical landscapes, Dau Homestay features a private balcony with scenic views of the rice paddy fields. It is a 15-minute walk from Tirta Gangga Water Palace. Water sports activities and pampering in-room massages can be arranged.

Dau Homestay is a 30-minute drive from Candidasa Beach and a 45-minute drive from Amed Beach, known for its snorkelling and diving spots. Ngurah Rai International Airport can be reached by a 2.5-hour car ride from the property.

The homestay is fitted with mosquito nets and a fan. Guests can prepare meals in the well equipped kitchen and relax in the seating area. Bath and shower facilities are available in the private semi open bathroom.

Area shuttles, bicycle and car rental can be offered for those guests who wish to explore the area, while cycling and hiking trips can be arranged for the adventurous ones. Other on-site conveniences include airport transfers, laundry service and free parking spaces.

Breakfast is served daily in the homestay. For other meals, guests can take a 5-minute stroll to nearby restaurants that serve Indonesian and Balinese delights. Please inform Dau Homestay in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
The property requires a deposit to secure the booking. Staff will contact guests directly through e-mail or phone with payment instructions.
Managed by a private host

Address: Jl. Raya Seraya Banyuning Karangasem BanyuningKarangasem 80811Bali
Description:
Villa Batu Tangga is a private seafront villa located in East Balis Amed area, known for its colourful coral reefs, clear waters and scenic beaches. Perched on a cliff, this spacious non-smoking villa enjoys panoramic views of Lombok Strait. Free Wi-Fi is accessible in the villa and on the terrace.

Batu Tangga features large windows which allow fresh ocean air into the rooms. Tastefully decorated, its 3 bedrooms boast open views of the sea, garden and pool. The large terrace is a perfect place to relax while enjoying the view and sea breeze.

Balinese home-cooked meals can be prepared by the villas housekeeper upon request. The fully equipped kitchen is also available for guests use. Alternatively, there are restaurants a short stroll from the villa.

Guests may lounge by the villas private pool or snorkel directly from the villas swimming platform and ladder to the sea. Recreational activities in the area include scuba diving, snorkelling, fishing and hiking.

Batu Tangga is a 40-minute drive from Tirta Ganga Water Palace and a 3-hour drive from Ngurah Rai International AIrport. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please inform Villa Batu Tangga in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Hotel Chandrawati Palace has a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Abu Road. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. Some units at the property feature a patio with a mountain view.

Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a bidet and free toiletries, all guest rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also offer a balcony. At Hotel Chandrawati Palace all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers an Asian or vegetarian breakfast.

Free private parking and a business centre are available, as well as a 24-hour front desk.

The nearest airport is Maharana Pratap Airport, 178 km from Hotel Chandrawati Palace. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Description:
The Garden View Hostel is located in Cairo, 800 metres from the Ramses Railway Station. It has a fitness centre, and offers air-conditioned rooms with balconies and free Wi-Fi.

Garden View rooms have large windows and modern furnishings. They come equipped with satellite TV, as well as tea and coffee making facilities. The private bathrooms include hairdryers.

In the morning, the hotel serves a continental breakfast. Hostel Garden View has a tour desk that offers information on local attractions, and can assist with car hire. Bicycle rental is also available.

The Garden View Hostel is less than 3 km from the Egyptian Museum, and is less than 17 km from Cairo International Airport. The hostel provides an airport shuttle service on request, and free public parking is possible on site. Please check your visa requirements before you travel.

Address: Dreamland Al Wahat Road 6th of October CityCairo
Description:
Featuring panoramic views of the Dreamland Golf Course in Cairo, this 4-star hotel offers modern rooms with satellite TV and a private balcony. Facilities include an outdoor pool and a spa.

The air-conditioned rooms of Swiss Inn Plaza are decorated with wooden furnishings. All rooms are equipped with a telephone, a minibar, and a safety deposit box. Room service is available.

Agador spa offers a wide variety of therapies and treatments, including water spa treatments. Swiss Inn also offers laundry facilities, car rental, and a concierge service.

The Great Pyramids of Giza are just a 15-minute drive from Swiss Inn Plaza. Free private parking is available on site. Please inform Swiss Inn Plaza Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.
Please check your visa requirements before you travel.

Please note that Accommodation at Swiss Inn Plaza will be bed only No Meals are served at the hotel
Additional Fees will be applied in case Camera, photographer, photo sessions, wedding planner or wedding preparation are requested, please contact the hotel for any information.
